Interface RepeatAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DriftRepeatAction, DropRepeatAction, OMTPolyOnFieldRepeatAction, ProtegeRepeatAction, ScenarioRepeatAction, SpillRepeatAction

    public interface RepeatAction
    Interface for implementation periodically repeating actions
    Author:
    Ru
